div.p: Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Person|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

tr.td: Element `Person.deceased[x]` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
Element `Person.maritalStatus` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
Element `Person.communication` has a context of Person based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Person`.
